PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2008-12472008-06-18,  HERITAGE,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission Act
PrecisAppointment of SUZANNE LAMARRE of Longueuil, Quebec, to be a full-time member of the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years; designate SUZANNE LAMARRE for the Quebec region, as established under subsection 10(1.1) of that Act; and determine that SUZANNE LAMARRE shall reside within 100 kilometres of the Quebec regional Office, effective June 30, 2008.
AttachmentsAttachment
